Class LyricsView

java.lang.Object
musicApp.views.View<LyricsView, LyricsController>
musicApp.views.songs.LyricsView
public class LyricsView extends View<LyricsView, LyricsController>
The LyricsView class is responsible for displaying and updating the lyrics of a song. It handles the userProfile interactions and delegates actions to the LyricsController.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the view. Sets up listeners and UI components.
      Specified by:
      init in class View<LyricsView, LyricsController>

    • initButtons

      public void initButtons()
      Initializes the buttons by adding a listener to the currently loaded song property. When the song changes, the lyrics are updated.

    • initTranslation

      private void initTranslation()
      Initializes translations for UI elements using the LanguageManager. This method loads translated text for labels, buttons, and dialogs.

    • showEditLyricsDialog

      public Optional<String> showEditLyricsDialog(String initialText)
      Displays a dialog to edit the lyrics.
      Parameters:
      initialText - the initial text to display in the text area
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the edited lyrics if saved, otherwise an empty Optional

    • updateLyrics

      public void updateLyrics()
      Updates the lyrics displayed in the view. Clears the current lyrics container and loads either a placeholder or the actual lyrics along with an edit header.

    • displayEmptyLyricsPlaceholder

      private void displayEmptyLyricsPlaceholder()
      Displays a placeholder when no lyrics are available. The placeholder includes a message and a button to add lyrics.

    • displayLyricsWithHeader

      private void displayLyricsWithHeader(List<String> lyrics)
      Displays the lyrics along with an edit header.
      Parameters:
      lyrics - the list of lyric lines to display

    • createEditButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button createEditButton(String text)
      Creates a button with an edit icon and optional text.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to display on the button; if null, only the icon is shown
      Returns:
      the configured Button instance

    • refreshUI

      public void refreshUI()
      Refreshes the UI by reloading the translations.
